snippet.title: Banjo Kazooie The Corrupted Jiggys. (Trailer 1)
snippet.description:
#banjokazooie #nintendo64 #romhack #sorra1mods
Release 2023
Grunty is back and driven by her revenge more powerful than ever. Help Banjo and Kazooie together with old and new friends to save the "hubb lands" from the evil power of grunty. And find out what these new corrupted jiggys are all about?

*DEVELOPER:* 
Sorra1 or also Animenatik Bob. I am known under both names 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgwApUqJaundxvcDbp7nQPg 

I speak german so ignore the existing english translation errors

Now i can finaly show you the first Trailer. 
At this point 12 months of modeling work and 8 months of programming work went into this mod. Unfortunately we are not finished yet. But soon. (I hope).

I can now proudly release the first trailer.
- 9 completely new worlds 
- new hubworld, 
- 97 jiggys,
- 910 notes. 
- Custom music (and also original BK music), 
- new mechanics,
- new transformations,
- secrets after 100%. 

*Ripostes made Songs Playlist for this romhack:*
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLphBMwcwOwp5BxnOiyPreaIaAir5kmdfq 


If you want the custom made boxart for this romhack (to make your own n64 boxart) here are the 3 necessary pictures in 8k. FrontCover, Backside and the side of the boxart.
(Syeo and i made the Boxart but he alone made my Logo)

*FrontCover:*
https://i.postimg.cc/zBhN80QC/boxart.jpg 
*BackCover:*
https://postimg.cc/p9zPbmWq
*SideCover:*
https://postimg.cc/VdfvqWf1

*Discord for Banjo Kazooie Modding* 
Hackpack - A Banjo-Kazooie Modding Community
https://discord.gg/Cm2JuQvewN
